Publications ZikaBase: an integrated ZIKV-human interactome Map database, S Gurumayum, R Brahma, LD Naorem, M Muthaiyan, J Gopal, Virology 514, 203-210 7 2018 Identification of hub genes and pathways in Zika virus infection using RNA-seq data: a network-based computational approach, R Brahma, S Gurumayum, LD Naorem, M Muthaiyan, J Gopal, Viral immunology 31 (4), 321-332 5 2018 Triton X‐114 Fractionated Subcellular Proteome of Leptospira interrogans Shows Selective Enrichment of Pathogenic and Outer Membrane Proteins in the … S Thoduvayil, G Dhandapani, R Brahma, R Devasahayam Arokia Balaya, Proteomics 20 (19-20), 2000170 1 2020 Comparative proteome analysis reveals pathogen specific outer membrane proteins of Leptospira, MGM Gunasekaran Dhandapani¶, Thoduvayil Sikha¶ , Aarti Rana, Rahul Brahma .

Research at Chemoinformatics lab , Soongsil University Soongsil University is carrying out convergence research projects beyond the existing interdisciplinary research. We are enhancing the image of the university as a leader in convergence research and education leading to basic and applied technology and advanced technology We carry out optimized convergence research tasks of the fourth industrial revolution era ranging from life technology, robot technology, IT, energy, distribution logistics, contents, and train high-fidelity research manpower that will be the hero of the convergence industry in Korea.
